member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.OledDisplay
member.summary: A 128x128 OLED Display module by Seeed Studio for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.OledDisplay.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.OledDisplay._sleepAfterSend
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thread should sleep after a send operation.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.OledDisplay._sleeptime
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time to sleep (if is true) after a send operation.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.OledDisplay.Send(System.Byte,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends a command to the display device.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.OledDisplay.FlushRawBitmap(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes the passed in data to the passed in position on the screen
